name: Flower Pots Made with Broken Dishes
description: Let your creativity bloom with DIY Mosaic Flower Pots! Upcycle your broken dishes or thrift store finds with this trash-to-treasure craft and create one-of-a-kind flower pots for your garden or for gifts.

name: Jar Turned into a Latern
description: Summer is one of my favorite seasons for entertaining. I created some beautiful mason jar lanterns to use for some of our summer parties and I’m in love!

name: Suitcase Chair
description: My latest sytyc project for 'upcycle' week. A little less sewing than usual and a little more decor-y. ..... I love vintage luggage! It's so nostalgic to me, I always am reminded of my grandfather's travel journal that he wrote in the 40s. As a bonus, this suitcase smelled like my grandpa's house when I bought it! Talk about nostalgia. When I think of upcycling, I think of turning something into something completely different.

name: Toilet Paper Decoration
description: A faux metal piece made of recycled toilet paper rolls. Well the walls in my room have been looking awfully bare recently, so I figured something needed to be done! Since my bank account is awfully bare as well, I decided to do something with what I had around the house. I've been saving toilet paper roles for a while with another project in mind, but this is what I settled on. Cheap, easy, and looks pretty good once it's finished! It has a nice faux metal/wrought iron-ish look to it, which makes it look way more impressive than it actually is :)

name: Turn a Glove into a Chipmunk
description: While gloves and socks are made to be forever together, often they choose to divorce and spend their lives in a solitude. Of course, we have to respect their decision, but it’s hard to look at them being all lonely, laying somewhere in the backs of a drawers. Luckily, crafter and author Miyako Kanamori has a wonderful solution! With some plastic surgery you can turn your old and lonely glove into an ever happy chipmunk! In her book, Happy Gloves: Charming Softy Friends Made from Colorful Gloves, Kanamori also gives complete instructions on how to make a frog, duck, flower, car, donkey, tiger, and more!

name: Toilet Paper Roll Organizers
description: I have used toilet paper (TP) rolls for a while to keep cables wrapped up and organized. During my last organizing spree I realized that they can actually be used to organize boxes of cables and wires quite effectively, too.

name: 30 Outstanding Recycling DIYs
description: Are you bored and can’t find anything to do? Guess what? We have the coolest video with the most outstanding DIYs made completely from recycled materials! What is best than making cool DIYs? That’s right, making environmentally friendly crafts that are good for the planet as well. The first DIY idea we’ll show you is the funnel. You just need a couple of empty plastic bottles and voilá!

name: 10 DIY Ideas from Your Recycling Bin
description: DIY crafts using recycled materials can be easy if you watch these projects. If you don’t have an opportunity to separate your waste for recycling, do not throw it. Turn the recycle bin into a craft project while also helping our fragile ecosystem as well!

name: Reusable Fabric Gift Bags
description: Several years ago, I got some reusable fabric gift bags, and every holiday and birthday since then I’ve wished that I had more of them. I spend so much time – hours – every Christmas wrapping dozens (hundreds?) of presents for family and friends. I waste so much wrapping paper that ends up being ripped up and thrown out on Christmas morning. It’s a waste and an unnecessary cost...

name: Recycled Craft Ideas
description: 4 easy to make recycled craft ideas where we reuse a empty containers, boxes and cola bottles to make new storage organizers and more for home use. This video will make you think once before you throw the empty bottles and boxes.

name: 100 Home Decor Recycling Projects
description: You will love recycling and reusing old things and waste materials after seeing these unique recycling ideas for reusing your old stuff. What materials can be recycled, and how are they recycled for home projects? What things we can be made from recycled materials that we can use for DIY home decor projects, crafts and kids projects? Wait!! I’ll explain recycled art here for you. First, try to maintain the good health of the planet by reducing pollution!

name: 50 Clever Upcycling Ideas
description: With the passing of the holidays and the start of the New Year, many of us find ourselves wanting to do a little household tidying. Do you have a closet filled with items you no longer use? If you’re like us, it may include things like a box of faded t-shirts, a cache of cassettes with music from the 80s, and a few offbeat tchotchkes rescued from the second-hand store. Before you pull out those garbage bags, take a peek at all of the things you can do with your long-lost treasures. All it takes is a little inspiration to turn these seemingly useless objects into exciting conversation pieces of creativity.

name: 45 Brilliant Ideas to Repurpose Old Things Into Something New
11 Easy & Cute Recycling Ideas
description: Today, we'll teach you how to turn trash into treasure! It's really cool to recycle and upcycle some old and unnecessary stuff. First of all, it will cost you nothing, secondly, by recycling you make this world better and save our planet. Plastic bottles, plastic spoons and forks, cardboard, paper - all these are good materials for crafting – your possibilities with plastic and paper are truly endless. Learn to make awesome and useful crafts from trash in no time!

name: 10 DIY Creative Recycling Ideas You Can Do to Help Save the Earth
description: A lot of things can be recycled, including furniture, decorations and accessories. In one way or another, they can all be used to create a home with tons of character.  Here is a round up of our favorite useful DIY projects using recycled materials.

name: 23 Repurpose Ideas to Organize Your Home
Genuine Chainmaille From Pop Tabs
description: Constructing a genuine European 4 in 1 chainmaille weave using only pop tabs. Turns out this is very easy and makes a really great looking piece of maille, and as an added bonus you don't have to worry about having a quarter mile of wire on hand to attach them together.

name: 3 Cute & Easy DIY Earrings
description: I'm showing you 3 different diy earrings today, starting from easy to hardest! So excited to show you how I diy'd Moschino's $1620 earrings for only $9!!!
